column4: im confused, im running a 'hardy' box, it has php 5.2.4-2ubuntu5.6, yet the only version available on ddebs is 5.2.4-2ubuntu5.7  why is that?
is hardy out of date now?
anyone know where i can find libapache2-mod-php5-dbgsym_5.2.4-2ubuntu5.6_i386.ddeb?  (as opposed to 5.7)
if you have the filename you can websearch it
yes im aware of that, only one result on google, which is the official ddebs page that doesn't have it
as long as the ISO passes MD5 test then you can get it anywhere you wish. I advise torrents for maximum speed as well as parity due to the torrent protocol
